ability.Desolate Trail: This Pokemon causes the terrain to become Grassy Terrain for 10 turns when it enters battles.
ability.Omen of Plague: When this Pokemon is on the field, the oppenent has a 30% chance to be poisoned at the end of each turn.

Plague Fang.effect: Has a 30% chance to badly poison the target.

Withering Gaze.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

Pestilence.effect: Poison the opponents and lower their Speed by 1 stage.
